meanings.definition: The excessive excretion of waste products from the body.
meanings.sent1: The hyperexcretion of toxins can lead to health issues.
meanings.sent2: After the meal, his hyperexcretion of food waste was noticeable.
meanings.sent3: The hyperexcretion of garbage from the bin was quite a sight!
meanings.sent4: Her hyperexcretion of emotions overwhelmed her like a flood.
meanings.sent5: The hyperexcretion of leaves in autumn creates a colorful carpet.

meanings.definition: The act of expelling waste materials in large quantities.
meanings.sent1: The hyperexcretion of water from the dam caused flooding.
meanings.sent2: During the illness, his hyperexcretion of fluids was concerning.
meanings.sent3: The hyperexcretion of confetti at the party was unexpected.
meanings.sent4: The hyperexcretion of ideas from his mind was unstoppable.
meanings.sent5: The hyperexcretion of sand from the hourglass marked time passing.
